genSynthFlow

Class GenSynthFlow

  • java.lang.Object
    • genSynthFlow.GenSynthFlow

  • public class GenSynthFlow
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate Synthetic Flow Data between OAs and WZs based on tables of total commuters from each OA and from each WZ, combined with knowledge about distance of travel to work for those commuters.
    Version:
    1.1, August 2014
    Author:
    Richard Thomas

    • Field Summary

      private static java.lang.String OA_ZONECODE_FLOW_ERRORS_FILESTUB

      Range allowed between PWCs for each distance interval (allow 500m extra as may reach a nearby area even if not its centroid)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getDistanceSqr(int indexOA, int indexWZ)
      Get distance^2 between specified origin and destination
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main program entry point and sequencing of major operations
      private static void writeFlowMatrixPairsCsv(int[][] flowMatrix, ZoneFlowList oaList, ZoneFlowList wzList, java.lang.String filenameStub)
      Write Synthesized Origin-Destination Flow Matrix Pairs to a CSV file Each OA-WZ record (line in file) holds: FLOW_OA_WZ - Flow ID (concatenation of OA_Code & WZ_Code) OA_Code - ONS "Output Area" (origin) label OA_PWC_X - Easting of OA Population Weighted Centroid OA_PWC_Y - Northing of OA Population Weighted Centroid WZ_Code - ONS "Workplace Zone" (destination) label WZ_PWC_X - Easting of WZ Population Weighted Centroid WZ_PWC_Y - Northing of WZ Population Weighted Centroid Count - Total commuters on this flow route
      private static void writeFlowsInRangeCsv(java.lang.String flowsInRangeCsv)
      Write to a CSV file all OA-WZ flow paths within selected distance range.

    • Field Detail

      • RAND_SEED

        private static final long RAND_SEED
        Seed for pseudo-random number generator for building population Either fix it (for repeatable population) or use system time in ms
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEL_DIST_INTERVAL

        static final int SEL_DIST_INTERVAL
        Selected distance interval (e.g. 0 = 0_2km)

      • FLOWS_IN_RANGE_CSV_FILESTUB

        static final java.lang.String FLOWS_IN_RANGE_CSV_FILESTUB
        (Output Diagnostic) CSV filename stub (no suffix!) of all flows within selected distance interval. This can be transformed to line plots using "XY to line" tool in ArcGIS. (Set to null if diagnostics not required)

      • FLOW_MATRIX_CSV_FILESTUB

        static final java.lang.String FLOW_MATRIX_CSV_FILESTUB
        (Output) CSV filename stub (no suffix!) of final estimated flows counts between each OA-WZ origin-destination pair. 2 Output files will be produced (for ArcGIS and QGIS) allowing transformation to line plots using "XY to line" ArcGIS tool or "points2one" QGIS plugin.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OA_ZONECODE_FLOW_ERRORS_FILESTUB

        private static final java.lang.String OA_ZONECODE_FLOW_ERRORS_FILESTUB
        (Output) Filename stub to write details of OAs (with their zone codes) and their flow counts for the synthesized population vs the census derived population for mapping quality of results. (Set to null if diagnostics not required)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WZ_CODE_CSV_FIELD

        static final int WZ_CODE_CSV_FIELD
        Field index along CSV line for ONS WZ geography code
        See Also:

        static final int OA_CODE_CSV_FIELD
        Field index along CSV line for ONS OA geography code
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PWC_DISTANCE_LIMITS

        static final int[][] PWC_DISTANCE_LIMITS
        Range allowed between PWCs for each distance interval (allow 500m extra as may reach a nearby area even if not its centroid)

      • randGenSynthPop

        static java.util.Random randGenSynthPop
        Pseudo-random number generator for building population (seed can be fixed for repeatable populations)

      • writeFlowsInRangeCsv

        private static void writeFlowsInRangeCsv(java.lang.String flowsInRangeCsv)
        Write to a CSV file all OA-WZ flow paths within selected distance range. This can be transformed to line plots in ArcGIS using "XY to line".
        Parameters:
        flowsInRangeCsv - Filename for CSV output

      • writeFlowMatrixPairsCsv

        private static void writeFlowMatrixPairsCsv(int[][] flowMatrix,
                           ZoneFlowList oaList,
                           ZoneFlowList wzList,
                           java.lang.String filenameStub)
        Write Synthesized Origin-Destination Flow Matrix Pairs to a CSV file Each OA-WZ record (line in file) holds: FLOW_OA_WZ - Flow ID (concatenation of OA_Code & WZ_Code) OA_Code - ONS "Output Area" (origin) label OA_PWC_X - Easting of OA Population Weighted Centroid OA_PWC_Y - Northing of OA Population Weighted Centroid WZ_Code - ONS "Workplace Zone" (destination) label WZ_PWC_X - Easting of WZ Population Weighted Centroid WZ_PWC_Y - Northing of WZ Population Weighted Centroid Count - Total commuters on this flow route
        Parameters:
        filenameStub - Filename stub (omitting ".csv") for CSV output

                 int indexWZ)
        Get distance^2 between specified origin and destination
        Parameters:
        indexOA - Origin index
        indexWZ - Destination index
        Returns:
        Origin-Destination distance^2
